comments:
Not exactly sure how I got this problem but checking the log I found the 
following exception:

This has been introduced by the fixes for bug 41807 and bug 41846. These fixes
have been revisited which also fixes the problem reported in this PR.

The fix is in N-builds > I20030909 and I-builds > I20030910.
*** Bug 42069 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 42830 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
